services.title: Blockchain Development
services.description: Leveraging my extensive knowledge in blockchain technology, I offer cryptocurrency programming services to integrate secure and efficient crypto solutions into your digital assets.

services.title: AI Engineering
services.description: Using advanced machine learning techniques, I deliver AI engineering services to solve complex problems, enhance your business operations and drive innovation in your products or platforms.

aboutpara: With a decade-long journey in software engineering, I've honed my skills in mobile and web application development, creating captivating digital experiences that drive business growth. My proficiency extends into the realm of AI engineering, where I apply advanced machine learning algorithms to solve complex problems. Alongside, my extensive knowledge and practical programming experience in the world of cryptocurrencies, driven by my passion for blockchain technology, further strengthens my ability to contribute significantly to innovative projects. This blend of knowledge, skills, and passion underscores my commitment to collective success and technological innovation.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a Software and AI Engineer,
resume.description: Versatile software engineer specializing in AI, with expertise in web and mobile app development, as well as data analysis and processing. Passionate about leveraging emerging technologies to craft innovative solutions. Ready to contribute dynamic insights to AI-driven projects.

experiences.bullets: Developed a comprehensive Early Warning System (EWS) project, focused on visualizing environmental risks including drought, floods, and food security, by implementing a full-stack solution using React and Leaflet for the frontend and Python Django for the backend.;Engineered backend Python scripts for the automated download, transformation, and integration of global data sets into a localized format for Madagascar, enhancing data relevance and accessibility.;Managed data uploads to GeoServer, ensuring robust data handling and seamless integration with the frontend application for real-time environmental monitoring.;Collaborated with the team to refine and calculate risk indices, providing crucial support in the analysis and presentation of data to optimize the EWS's predictive capabilities.;

experiences.position: ICT Software Engineer Intern at UNDP
experiences.bullets: Developed an internal tool designed to enhance organizational efficiency, utilizing React and Material-UI for frontend development, coupled with a Node.js backend and SQL database, streamlining workflow processes for employees.;Engineered a digital signage system to facilitate real-time communication and display relevant information throughout UNDP's facility, improving informational outreach and building operations.;Provided ongoing technical support and troubleshooting assistance, resolving issues related to software usability and functionality to ensure optimal user experience and system performance.;Contributed to the design and implementation of user interfaces and system architectures, delivering robust solutions that addressed specific organizational needs and improved daily operations.

Developed production level code, working on products in .NET Core framework such as React JS, NodeJS, MongoDB queries;Gained experience with both front-end and back-end development, developing website, fixing bugs and implementing new features;Pulled data from the SQL database, performed queries and displayed it on their website.

Worked both as part of a team and individually to develop a utility for testing production web services; did development on production level code working on products such as NodeJS  MongoDB queries and Angular; Gained experience with both front-end and back-end development fixing bugs and implementing new features; I was responsible for migrating existing service configurations to an updated format allowing for more scalability

education.universityPara: I started with learning Java, advanced to Python and web development since they are inside my interests. Took courses about Data Structure and Algorithms, Databases, various team project classes. However I moved to Turkey and I am currently a senior in Istanbul Okan University..
